validation.name_min: Name must be at least {{min}} characters long
validation.password_min: Password must be at least {{min}} characters long
validation.password_condition_capital_letter: Password must contain at least one capital letter
validation.password_condition_number: Password must contain at least one number
validation.password_condition_special_character: Password must contain at least one special character

validation.operator_type_only_for_operator: Operator type can only be set when role is operator

history.password_change: Password changed for user #{{entity_id}} by user #{{auth_id}}
